title: Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter, Don Johnson attend 'Brawl in Cell Block 99' premiere
description:
(30 Sep 2017) VINCE VAUGHN ATTENDS 'CELL BLOCK 99' PREMIERE
Vince Vaughn was in Hollywood on Friday night (29 September) for the premiere of his new indie "Brawl in Cell Block 99." 
Vaughn greeted co-stars including Don Johnson and Jennifer Carpenter at the Beyond Fest premiere at the Egyptian Theatre in Hollywood. He also chatted with German actor Udo Kier and the father of the film's writer and director, S. Craig Zahler. 
Vaughn stars in the movie as a criminal who must fight his way through a prison in an attempt to save his kidnapped pregnant wife, played by Carpenter. 
Vaughn will reunite with Zahler in the drama "Dragged Across Concrete," due out next year, which also stars Mel Gibson.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/c20b0dd1a917dfc54dadf5e2880f1f8e
